original_title: Mozart: Music for Piano: Friedrich Gulda
overview: The late Friedrich Gulda, an Austrian pianist who died on Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's birthday in 2000, puts decades of studying Mozart's music into practice in this concert of all-Mozart compositions performed on solo piano. The evening includes memorable interpretations of Mozart's "Fantasia in D minor, K. 397," "Sonata in F major, K. 332," "Fantasia in C minor, K. 475" and "Sonata in C minor, K. 457."
title: Mozart: Music for Piano: Friedrich Gulda
